Realistic TOW launchers sight.

08-13-2023 : UPDATE => Following a desactivated special character by gaijin, reworking sight with new sign for TV screen.

Realistic sight for TOW launchers mounted on vehicles.

Adapted for the game on realistic sights:
-Display of telemeter.
-Mobile tracker is fixed in situation (no dynamic elements)

The folders of followed vehicles are inclued in the download:
-germ_wiesel_1_tow
-it_m113a1_tow
-cn_m113a1_tow
-cn_cm25

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/i...

#universal #sight

I am back with a New Sight that works on all tanks.
Same Character as the previous Sight (Asuka Langley) but this time in the Swiming Suit.
If you wonder where i got the Image, i got it from a friend (i bet its from r34)
Anyways, if you want to request any Sights, you can leave a comment here or add me on Discord ,,average romania troll 6584"
#asuka_langley #asuka #alltanks #evangelion #anime

Hi War Thunder players,
This is Agava-2 thermal chanel and 1G46 day chanel for Swedish T 80 U.
Russian T-80U/UK has the same sights, but I upload for Sweden first for testing before releasing all my work~~
If you have any problems with my sights, please contact me and I'll try to support you!
Discord: https://discord.gg/w2g45zTx
Thank you so much!!!
Enjoy~~

* Note:
- 20/03/2025: Fixed and updated all custome sights; added some new one!
- 21/12/2025: Updated new versions.
- 16/12/2023: Added new 1G46 version.

#t72m1

Semi-original sight for swedish T72-m1.
The original sight is from another pack of sights. (sorry i don't remember the name of the player who created the orginal sight, but you can search sights for swedish tanks)
I turned the color sight to green for night battle because the light red was too bright.
I modified the letter of "MG" and "OF" (High Explosive) from cyrillic to latin and add rangefinder.

#m1a2_abrams #m1a2sep_abrams

US - M1A2 / SEP Sight
Zoom: 3.0x-10.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\us_m1a2_abrams

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\us_m1a2_abrams

Thank You for Downloading my Custom Sight, in the Folder are 4 Files, 3 of which are sights with different sizes that end in .BLK while the other one is the file from SketchUp that can be modified there
For more Custom Sights, you can either Request it or make it yourself by using this Tutorial (not mine)
https://youtu.be/xvvTipG9_Ms

Realistic AMX30-AUF1 sight.

Sights versions presents in the pack:
-Realistic sight for direct short range shoot (HE rounds)
-Realistic sight for indirect long range shoot (all rounds)
-Customs sights for gunner optic view (HE+smocke, HE-VT+smocke and combined 3 rounds)

watch out on realistic sights if you use the gunner's optic, at short range the gap is important.

Adapted for the game on realistic sights: display of telemeter and distance correction

The folder of the vehicle fr_amx_30_auf_1 is inclued in the download.

For install, look that tutoriel (En...
